issue.title: [CF 424] icd.lua:134 error when logging/reloading
issue.body:
I am using an "internal cooldown" button to track Nature's Grace. As a resto druid, I do not have eclipse, which is fine but it looks like TMW is trying to display its use-Unit-Cooldown help messages and a lua error happens.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Log in (or /reload)

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

All icons show up; they do not. I do a /tmw, /tmw to cycle in/out configuration options and everything works.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

4.8.0

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Message: TellMeWhen: Group: 8, Icon: 4: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Types\icd.lua:134: attempt to index field 'HELP' (a nil value)
Time: Sat Jan 14 20:19:55 2012
Count: 1
Stack: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2880: in function `Error'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:4539: in function <Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:4359>
[C]: in function `pcall'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:3443: in function `Group_Update'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2040: in function <Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1981>
(tail call): ?
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[2]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[2]"]:5>
(tail call): ?
...e\AddOns\PitBull4\libs\AceTimer-3.0\AceTimer-3.0.lua:164: in function <...e\AddOns\PitBull4\libs\AceTimer-3.0\AceTimer-3.0.lua:138>

Locals: <none>

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

Here is button's export string:
^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sicd ^SShowTimerText^B ^SUnAlpha^N0.8 ^SCooldownShowWhen^Sunusable ^SEnabled^B ^SName^S16886:~`60 ^SShowWhen^Salways ^t^N48026^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Sylvanbear | Imported from CurseForge issue #424 | Raw
